ability.name: Your Allies Turn on You!
ability.flavor: You turn your enemies' ire to the target.

metadata.flavor: You turn your enemies' ire to the target.
metadata.item_name: Your Allies Turn on You! (11 Wrath)

effect.t1: 5 + P damage; I < WEAK, slowed (save ends)
effect.t2: 9 + P damage; I < AVERAGE, slowed (save ends)
effect.t3: 12 + P damage; I < STRONG, slowed (save ends)

effects.effect: While the target is slowed this way, each of their allies who starts their turn within 5 squares of them must use a free maneuver to make a free strike against the target. Additionally, while the target is slowed this way, each of their allies within 5 squares of them who can make a triggered free strike against a different creature must make the free strike against the target instead.
